model.board
Interface Position

All Known Subinterfaces:
UpdatablePosition
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayPosition
public interface Position

A game position, modeled as an immutable mapping from squares to pieces

Method Summary
 Position deepClone()
          Returns a deep clone of the position.
 Piece get(int file, int rank)
          The piece at a given location (square) given by file and rank
 Piece get(Square square)
          The piece at a given location (square)
 

Method Detail

get

Piece get(Square square)
The piece at a given location (square)

Parameters:
square - The location
Returns:
the piece at that location, null if there is no piece at that location

get

Piece get(int file,
          int rank)
The piece at a given location (square) given by file and rank

Parameters:
file - The file (x-coordinate) of the location
rank - The rank (y-coordinate) of the location
Returns:
the piece at that location, null if there is no piece at that location

deepClone

Position deepClone()
Returns a deep clone of the position. That it, it returns a Position of the same kind with equivalent pieces placed on it.

Returns:
a deep clone
